attributes.action: Say No to the Garrett Hall Development by Peel Holdings
attributes.additional_details:
We want the government to halt the building of 600 houses on the area surrounding Garrett Hall which is situated between Astley and Mosley common in the Tyldesley area of Manchester.

This is the only area of green space left in this part of Tyldesley and is home to a farm, is habitat for local wildlife and is potentially an area of historical interest.

I urge local residents to sign this petition as once we lose our last remaining piece of countryside we will never regain it.
